title: Can we have some champion diversity please?
body:
Vayne has basically a 30% pick rate, she is in almost 1/3rd of all games.
Jinx has an almost 35% pick rate she is in OVER 1/3rd of all games.

in other words one or the other is in almost every game.
like can we not have this please? 

im not bitching about the champs themselves (although i would have a few things to say about vayne) i just don't want to be paired against the same champs over and over and over again, it stops being fun and just becomes a slog.

the rift is completely dominated atm by 
vayne 
jinx
trist
thresh 
lee-sin

its these same champs over and over again, its just straight up boring.

replies.body:
We are literally doing a rework of adcs and adc items soon? come on man =P

Have you seen the changes a bunch of adcs changed + a tonne of item changes too!
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/preseason.html

We have listened and agreed thats why we are making ALL these changes

I know haha and i think some of those changes are going to be very interesting indeed!
but after all the new champion update hype has settled i cant shake the feeling that vayne will still come out on top again.

i mean why wouldnt she? look at her kit, % true damage insane mobility, more cc than most adc's can dream of. she's an adc AND and assassin, 
thats iike having a fire pokemon thats also water type too...

i do love what you did with graves though, he is going to feel like a proper shotgunner now! he has very clear strengths and weaknesses, and is adding much more diversity of play to the game, i cant wait to play him ^^


i guess its just the accumulated strain of dealing with vayne every game for a whole season has taken its toll, and i needed to say something.
sorry.

P -- New "Destiny"
1. Graves’ attack is a cone of 4 bullets whose AD ratio scales up by 33% over game time. The first bullet does 0.75-1.1 tAD (by level); extra bullets deal 33% of that. Each bullet can apply On Hit Effects, but only once per target. Graves’ crits fire more bullets (8 normally, 10 with Infinity Edge), empowering him at close range to burst a target and long range to deal AoE damage.
2. Graves stores two bullets at any time. After using them, he must reload. Reload has a longer delay and is reduced only slightly by attack speed. Graves’ time between attacks otherwise is reduced dramatically by attack speed.
3. Unlike other basic attacks, Graves’ bullets hit the first unit they collide with.

poor yorick tho
if i knew how to fix these problems id be working for riot by now.

There is not much you can do, their kit and how much damage or push they have, or in Thresh's case, how much utility he has is just too great.

* Vayne, Trist and Lee have all got escapes.
* Vayne's escape gives her an extra hit.
* Trist, Lee and Vayne both have an ult that not only does tons of damage, but also pushes the enemy back for a second emergency escape AND a Vayne stun when they land into a wall.
* Vayne, Trist and Lee all can use their escapes or have a built in initiate which can be used without even seeing the enemy.
* Jinx and Trist have really good lane clear, which late game can push very easy.
* Jinx has a slow and a map wide ult and some CC to boot.

Aside from three of them being squishy when they build full AD, they have too much going for them to not be used.

And most players, if not everyone who can use an AD can use at least one of them well enough to be competent enough to go AD.

Thresh on the other hand, if you can land his hook than it's basically game over, his Q>Q>E>R combo almost guarantees someone is dead and his W, that is yet another escape that can be used.

I can't really argue against them, they all simply need a nerf, and not a let's change the numbers nerf, but a remake nerf to change some of their skills to better fit with all other champions in their category.
vayne has and ult that does damage and pushes back o.0?

Champion Diversity is not equal pick rates. Equal pick rates are out of Riot's control, they can't help it when players just enjoy playing certain champions more than others.

Champion Diversity is the ability to play other champions and be successful. 

Could you pick Blitzcrank or Nautilus instead of Thresh and do well? 
At the moment, yeah. Champion Diversity.
